titles.title: A bill recognizing the 100th anniversary of Mesa Verde National Park.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 7/1/2005--Passed Senate without amendment. Recognizes the 100th anniversary of Mesa Verde National Park in 2006. Urges all U.S. citizens to join in the Centennial Celebration of Mesa Verde National Park by participating in the many activities planned throughout that year.
